title: The Strange Case of Dr Jekyll & Mr Hyde
description:
'â€˜Man is not truly one, but truly two"
A terrible killer lurks in London's dark and foggy corners His crimes are witnessed, but no one can track him down. At the same time, the respectable Dr Jekyll is on a quest of his own.But Dr Jekyll's discoveries look set to unleash an appalling truth. Just how closely entwined is his identify with that of the brutish Mr Hyde?"excellent and horrific and captivating" THE SUNDAY REVIEW, 1886Stevenson's classic "shilling shocker" in a format more readers can access and enjoyDyslexia-Friendly edition
author: Robert Louis Stevenson
